models.Category: A product category with hierarchical parent-child relationships, image, SEO, and display order.
models.CategoryOption: Flattened category for parent dropdown selection with depth level.

relationships: Categories can have a parent category forming a tree hierarchy.
Each category has a productCount showing how many products belong to it.
